source:
%%sql
-- Build the IMS historic info table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim (
    IMSAttributeID,
    BDCAIDLegacy,
    AttributeID,
    BDCAttributeName,
    BDCAttributeNumber,
    BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IsPersonalData,
    MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IMSAttributeHelp,
    IsSpecialCategoryData,
    RetentionPeriod,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IMSAttributeType,
    IMSAttributeStatus,
    IMSAttributePriority,
    IMSAttributeResolution,
    IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IMSAttributeDateModified,
    IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
    IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
    IMSAttributeDateEntered,
    IMSAttributeDeleted,
    IMSAttributeDescription,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT DISTINCT
    Row_Number() over (Order by T1.bdc_attribute_num_container NULLS LAST)      AS IMSAttributeID,
    IFNULL(T1.bdca_id, 'No Info')                                               AS BDCAID,
    IFNULL(T1.id, 'No Info')                                                    AS AttributeID,
    IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_name, 'No Info')                                    AS BDCAttributeName,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number, 'No Info')                              AS BDCAttributeNumber,
    IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_num_container, concat('BDC A - ',T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number)) AS BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c, 'No Info')                           AS BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_num_container, 'No Info')                              AS BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IFNULL(T1.is_this_personal_data_c, 'No Info')                               AS IsPersonalData,
    IFNULL(T1.minimise_after_processing_c, 'No Info')                           AS MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IFNULL(T1.help, 'No Info')                                                  AS IMSAttributeHelp,
    IFNULL(T1.is_this_special_category_data, 'No Info')                         AS IsSpecialCategoryData,
    IFNULL(T1.retention_period, 'No Info')                                      AS RetentionPeriod,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1, 'No Info')                    AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1_name, 'No Info')               AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1ims_bdc_entity_ida, 'No Info')  AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1, 'No Info')               AS IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IFNULL(T1.user_id_c, 'No Info')                                             AS IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c, 'No Info')                                   AS IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c, 'No Info')                                            AS IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c, 'No Info')                                  AS IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IFNULL(T1.type, 'No Info')                                                  AS IMSAttributeType,
    IFNULL(T1.status, 'No Info')                                                AS IMSAttributeStatus,
    IFNULL(T1.priority, 'No Info')                                              AS IMSAttributePriority,
    IFNULL(T1.resolution, 'No Info')                                            AS IMSAttributeResolution,
    IFNULL(T1.work_log, 'No Info')                                              AS IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IFNULL(T1.date_modified, 'No Info')                                         AS IMSAttributeDateModified,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeDateEntered,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeDeleted,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeDescription,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
    'No Info'                                                                   AS IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
    7                                                                           AS SourceSystemID,
    First(to_timestamp(T1.expected_from))                                       AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(
        IFNULL(T1.bdca_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_num_container,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_num_container,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.is_this_personal_data_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.minimise_after_processing_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.is_this_special_category_data,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_period,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1ims_bdc_entity_ida,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.',  
        '.'))                                                                   AS RowID,
    'Y'                                                                         AS IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_attribute T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "IMS" = T2.Description
WHERE T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY T1.bdca_id,
T1.id,
T1.bdc_attribute_name,
    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number,
    T1.bdc_attribute_num_container,
    T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c,
    T1.bdc_entity_num_container,
    T1.is_this_personal_data_c,
    T1.minimise_after_processing_c,
    T1.help,
    T1.is_this_special_category_data,
    T1.retention_period,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1_name,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1ims_bdc_entity_ida,
    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1,
    T1.user_id_c,
    T1.information_owner_c,
    T1.user_id1_c,
    T1.information_expert_c,
    T1.type,
    T1.status,
    T1.priority,
    T1.resolution,
    T1.work_log,
    T1.fk_bdce_id,
    T1.date_modified
